stage-1.subtitle: Choose an option to get started
stage-1.modal-desc: If you're restoring a wallet created in another application, you may find some of your assets are not visible. Don't worry. Create a new wallet and send your assets to your new Lace wallet address and everything should be visible again.

stage-2.desc: Please review the lace Privacy Policy and Terms of Use
stage-2.title: Lace terms of use
stage-2.accept-the-terms: I accept the terms of use
stage-2.full-privacy:
Your privacy it's important to us

✅ Lace will collect pseudonymous analytics info
❌ Not access your private keys
❌ Not record your IP address
❌ Not sell your personal data

stage-3.title: Let’s setup your new wallet
stage-3.choose-a-wallet-name: Choose a name to help you identify your wallet
stage-3.password-validation-2: Use a longer pattern with more turns

stage-4.desc: We recommend to write it down in a safe place
stage-4.title: Save your passphrase
